Diphtheria – Disease Information Statement (DIS). 2023 Nov; updated 2024 Aug. https://www.physiciansforinformedconsent.org/diphtheria. **Tetanus – Disease Information Statement (DIS)** Citation:Physicians for Informed Consent. Tetanus – Disease Information Statement (DIS). 2023 Nov; updated 2024 Aug. https://www.physiciansforinformedconsent.org/tetanus. **Pertussis(Whooping Cough) –Disease Information Statement (DIS)** Citation:Physicians for Informed Consent. Pertussis (Whooping Cough) – Disease Information Statement (DIS). 2023 Apr; updated 2024 Aug. https://www.physiciansforinformedconsent.org/pertussis. **Diphtheria, Tetanus, and Pertussis (Whooping Cough) – Vaccine Risk Statement (VRS)** Citation:Physicians for Informed Consent. Diphtheria, Tetanus and Pertussis – Vaccine Risk Statement (VRS). 2023 Nov; updated 2024 Aug. https://www.physiciansforinformedconsent.org/dtap. PIC’s educational materials are user-friendly tools developed from data compiled by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the National Center for Health Statistics. The Disease Information Statement (DIS) and Vaccine Risk Statement (VRS), which provide data on total diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis cases and available information on DTaP vaccine risks, allow for an informed risk-benefit calculation. **Recent Posts** Physicians for Informed Consent Files Certiorari Petition with the Supreme Court to End Censorship by the California Medical Board Physicians & Scientists Reveal: School-Mandated Vaccines Lack Proof of Safety Over Targeted Diseases Physicians for Informed Consent Releases New Collection of Educational Documents; States ‘MMR Vaccine Has Not Been Proven Safer Than Measles, Mumps and Rubella’ Landmark FDA Paper on Aluminum Safety in Vaccines Has Crucial Math Error PIC Releases Educational Documents; States ‘Haemophilus Influenzae Type B (Hib) Vaccine Has Not Been Proven Safer Than Hib’ **Categories** AB 2098 Aluminum Article CDPH Chicken Pox COVID-19 DTaP Vaccine Flu Formal Request Letter Hepatitis B Legal Mask Mandate Measles Medical Board MMR News PIC Letter Polio Press Release SB 277 SB276 Schoolchildren Seizures Tetanus Uncategorized Vaccine Mandates Vaccines Whooping Cough **Contact Us** PIC Contact Us Form Media Requests Privacy Policy Badges Site Map **PIC Supporter Newsletter**
